verses.roman:
tāra madhye ye ye varṣe āchaye viśeṣa
vistāriyā āge tāhā kahiba niḥśeṣa

synonyms: tāra madhye—within those episodes; ye ye—whatever; varṣe—in years; āchaye—there is; viśeṣa—particular occurrence; vistāriyā—elaborating; āge—ahead; tāhā—that; kahiba—I shall say; niḥśeṣa—completely.
translation: Whatever happened during those years that is worth noting shall be described later.
